name: jeanne dana
text: This place is right around the corner from our house so we go all the time. Now, I am pretty picky about my pizza. From the sauce to the crust to the amount of cheese and the even dispersment of the toppings.

name: Paquita Poindexter
text: Perfect dinner after a 5 hour flight to California. I was able to get a walk in and receive my meal quickly. The walk from the Hilton to this Blaze location was less than 5 minutes. I chose a build your own pizza. It cooked in less than 5 minutes.  Like other Blaze pizza, the mix of toppings is diverse and yummy.

name: Isaiah A.
text: The Staff was very nice and friendly. They aren't stingy at all with their toppings, if you ask for extra, they really give you extra. It was super delicious, especially the brownie. The inside and outside was kept very clean.

name: Asima Arora
text: Great pizza - customizable and quick fired to order.   Great alternative to eating at Disney!  Thin crust, other options are available as well such as gluten free pizzas and salads.  Gets pretty busy so there may be a bit of a wait but its fresh and hot abd made on the stop.  We enjoyed our pizza, would return!

name: Jay Finesilver
text: average pizza,  good service,  priced ok. to me, Mod Pizza is ten times better. passable, but the rating is too high.

name: Travis J
text: Build your own pizza with whatever toppings you want (that they have).. how can you go wrong?  Always stop off at this place whenever I'm in town and am never disappointed. ‚Ä¶More

name: Daniel Ayala-Quezada
text: Good place for customizable pizza pies and walking distance from Disneyland and surrounding hotels. The crew was friendly and efficient.  The had a fair amount of toppings to choose from and even offered a vegan chorizo for those who are ‚Ä¶More

name: Ned Medness
text: Yesterday, with friends I ordered pizza here. I liked it so much that we decided to repeat and make another order today, in order to try other options from the menu.

name: John Rozatti
text: Good pizza.  A little price for a rather small pizza but it is good.  They offer nice beverages besides just soda as well.  Prep time is fast once you have ordered

name: Constantin Predoaica
text:
The first of the two pizzas I ordered ended up being something else; their fair response was sorry we‚Äôll make another one.
Second, after 15 minutes I go back and ask if the second one is ready ; their ‚Ä¶More

name: Leah Vestal
text: Good prices, fast preparation, great food, and phenomenal service

name: Breanna Bernal
text: I ordered on DoorDash and altogether was an OK experience. If I could critique one thing though it would be that they did not add enough of any of the toppings that I had requested, mainly the mozzarella cheese my pizza was very lacking on ‚Ä¶More

name: Eric
text: The simple pie, their name for a cheese pizza, was really tasty and I always think of as a good metric to measure a pizza place by. The dough knots with cheese and pesto were also delicious.  An excellent option to save a little money if you're visiting Disneyland and need to eat.

name: Juan Ornelas
text: Love the fact they give you the freedom to configure your pizza anyway you want. I have 4 Pizzas in 1. DELICIOUS!!!!

name: Dennis Me
text: Staying at Castle Inn Suites and found this place on GrubHub, so glad I did.  The pizza was delicious and fresh.  Almost burned my tongue it was so hot.  The price was amazing 10.95 for a large, other places were 3 to 5 dollars more for the same.  Definitely will be using this place again!

name: heidi lui
text: Ignacio was great! He was so friendly and helped us figure out how it all worked on our first visit. The pizza was delicious and great value. Highly recommend the 'build your own' pizza, $10.95 +tax for essentially unlimited toppings on ‚Ä¶More

name: Debbie Sly
text: Pizza was tasty. Good sauce and thin crust. Would have given 5 stars based on the taste of the pizza However we ordered delivery and it was lukewarm. Did not use a bag to keep it hot like others who deliver do. Plus we were staying at a local hotel and they didn't include any plates, napkins,  etc.

name: Michael Marth
text: Great selection and fast service. I went with the ‚Äúmake your own pizza‚Äù: mozzarella, ricotta, red onions, kalamata olives and pepperoni on fresh dough with red sauce. With the wood burning stove the pizza came out just right and I washed it ‚Ä¶More

name: L R
text: Great pizza great ambiance highly recommend if you like to grab some food pizza!!!

name: John Berrang
text: Friendly staff, first guy we dealt with must have been new for was really lost and should not have been the first in the line. Place was clean, food was good. Wasn't busy and with six folks working the counter and oven the service was the slowest of any Blaze we've dined at.

name: Anthony Rice
text: As far as quick, fresh pizzas, you can't go better than blaze. Reasonably priced for whatever pizza you want, you can go for a basic pie and get 1 topping or top to your heart's content. Restaurant is inviting and comfortable, yet ‚Ä¶More

name: Ross Joseph
text: Heard a lot about Blaze Pizza and the 'make your own menu' and I have to admit, the pizza was really good but also really expensive. ‚Ä¶More

name: Lucas LeCompte
text: I ate here once, and it was so good I came back again! I love the keto crust pizzas, they are very good! They are even better if they are very well done!

name: T- Man
text: Build your own pizza. Visiting for Disney and this place is right underneath our hotel, the Hyatt. Excellent pizza. I did a custom BBQ chicken. Very good!

name: Pat Riot
text: Fast service. Polite staff. Variety of doughs from gluten free cauliflower and regular. Something for everyone. Highly recommend. Delicious.

name: Dr. Goodluck Ijezie-Desbois, PharmD
text: Great service. Great food.

name: Sarah Lindsay
text: They had friendly service. Their lunch deal is pretty good because ended up spending half than usually do. I love their blood orange fresca drink. Moreover customer service was great they took my food to me.

name: brad simone
text: Not sure what staff others have commented on I found them very friendly and patient as my wife and I split one pizza, her veggies and myself meat and everything

name: Pat White
text: Build your own pizza, costs about 12 dollars but enough for two if you're not super hungry, still worth it as you can load it up with everything

name: Chuck Finley
text: I tried ordering food online, but the website said they were closed despite being inside normal hours. I decided to walk there and put my order in person and was told that they wouldn't honor the price I had tried to get online. Couldn't ‚Ä¶More

name: Elena Mardar
text: Nice pizza place that has very delicious pizza. The pricing is ok if you're not a 5-person family. Good free parking, it's just a little bit difficult to get into this place. 5 stars overall

name: rebecca stopford
text: Did Build Your Own.... delicious

name: Beverly Beaumier
text: Fast, friendly and personable service. The pizza was fabulous at a very reasonable price. When we are in Anaheim again, we will be sure to order another one of their delicious vegetarian pizzas! Thank you to all the staff at the Anaheim location for making us feel welcome and for the great pizza!

name: Lisa Chambers
text: Great service... delicious pizza.... gluten free options available.

name: Natalie
text: Absolutely delicious! Great staff, Josh was terrific in explaining how they could cater for my coeliac son with gluten free options. Thanks so much!

name: Sope May
text: Keto Crust! An amazing find for pizza lovers on the keto diet. Even if you were just low-carbing it, I recommend stopping by. Their spicy red marinara sauce (not really spicy) was delicious. ‚Ä¶More

name: Brandon Cutajar
text: Superb. Build your own pizza for 11.99 cant go wrong.

name: Jason Comyns
text: Amazing Pizza. Literally could not be any fresher. Love the pesto on anything üåûüëç

name: Denise A
text: quick and very good!

name: Joker Gomez
text: Some truly great pizza had the best service and gave advice to where 2 go and what to see if your staying close 2 Disneyland this is a MUST EAT place both kids filled up and had the BEST Chocolate chips cookies around!!!!

name: peter sidhu
text: Great pizza... Mage what you want!

name: Randy Bolton
text: Love the fact you custom make your own pizza while looking at the ingredients. Cooking time is really fast, even doing lunch. Only minor negative is they offer no straws, only sippy cup fountain drink lids.

name: Danielle Taylor
text: The pizza was okay. The first two people who helped me were very friendly but the woman with both sides of her nose pierced who was the cashier seemed new and like customer service wasn't her thing. They charged me $6.50 for an alcoholic ‚Ä¶More

name: Lisa Anderson
text: Food good, but those close to Disney prices!  Very annoying that same product so much more than one close to our soCal home.

name: Randall March
text: Had our first Blaze pizza tonight the Anaheim location.  Very impressed! Thin crust and delicious! We will be back.

name: jimi brubaker
text: Good pizza but the prices at this location are just ridiculous. 30 bucks for to personal pies and 2 sm.. sodas.

name: Awais Khan
text: Really good pizza for a good price. The size looks to be medium only but that's fine, I'm a fan of the dough it's a great consistency and made with that ideal charring that doesn't mean the whole pizza is burnt. Good vegetarian choices.

name: Joshua Krzych
text: I met the fastest pizza cutter in the West!  He almost took his fingers off and dropped the cutter.  Employees were hilarious!  Don't remember the pizza really I think it was good.

name: jeff escuadro
text: Good pizza but wish non protein/ non meat toppings didn't cost extra. Other places you get to add different cheeses or veggies.. you get multiple toppings.  Overall good satisfying pizza.

name: Brent Plumley
text: Amazing pizza at a very reasonable price.   I recommend blaze to anyone in the Disney area looking for a great meal without paying Disney prices.

name: Cloudsley Falconbridge
text: Pizza, exactly the way you want it. Slightly pricey, but can you really put a price on the perfect meal? Never had a bad pie from this place, nor have I heard of one. I'll keep coming back as long as it's in business.

name: Apurva Patel
text: Dough was properly cooked, topping variety was okay, and the place is super careful about allergens. Not too expensive either. Try the cauliflower dough next time you're there!

name: Steve H
text: Always a good experience... Would be even better if it were "regular" blaze pricing and not 40% markup for being "by Disney".

name: Anthony Weirich
text: The workers here are usually very friendly and always ready to answers any questions. The pizza is almost always delicious my complaint is about the price. The price here is consistently $1-$2 more here than at other locations. I get it you ‚Ä¶More

name: Jacklyn Andersen
text: So many great options whether you are a carnivore, vegan, or need gluten free. I appreciate their patience and how seriously they took my sister in law's gluten allergy.

name: Davin Larsen
text: Within walking distance to our hotel and quicky  made our order. It hit the spot.

name: Ali Kassfy
text: It's good pizza, not amazing pizza. Staff isnt the friendliest but they are all children and expect them to be sad working on a Friday night. Could be a little cheaper but overall ok.  For taste I wish I could give it a 3.5

name: Josh
text: Super fast and friendly. what else could you want from a pizza place

name: Erik Bonilla
text: Not really impressed. Seemed very skimpy on the toppings, had to ask to add more, confusing at the order line, didn't look like they were enjoying making my pizza. Probably get get more value for the money elsewhere like chipotle

name: Aurelio Manzo
text: Really liked that they were open late. Pizza toppings were great. Just would have preferred that the crust was a little less burnt.

name: David de la Rosa
text: The build your own pizza is the best. Pack on all the toppings you like, then a short wait for your fast fired pizza. The service is very good and friendly.

name: Mimi Choate
text: Ordered timed delivery with Dash delivery. Pizza was cold. Salad was soggy. Seems like it would have been good if was hot and fresh.

name: cycozangel23
text: *Very busy location* if you are staying near by I recommend postmates or walking. The parking lot is very small and busy.

name: Danielle Ciccolo
text: Amazing very friendly and quick made my pizza perfect and exactly how I ordered it. Hit the spot after leaving Disney at 12:30 in the morning

name: James Dornan
text: I‚Äôm not a huge fan of build your own pizza places but the food is pretty solid

name: cherie weller
text: The staff here has zero personality. Of the 4 people working none of them looked like they were interested in being there. I've never not been greeted at a Blaze establishment until this one. The prices are on average $1 higher than most ‚Ä¶More

name: Ron Eifert
text: Adequate, was looking for a fast meal option and this was the fix. It did not appear very clean as tables were littered with spills and we had to clear our own place.

name: Andrew Newman
text: Food is okay, service awful. On line ordering didn't work, so placed order by phone. "Twenty minutes" turned into a forty five minute wait for pick up...cold food. Looks like they gave part of our order to someone else. Forgot the salad.

name: Andrew Dunn
text: I arrived at the restaurant during a busy time where the line was all the way out of the door. The staff did not worry about it. They still greeted people with smiles and we're very friendly about the experience. The pizza was delicious. I ‚Ä¶More

name: Rich W
text: I had a great experience with Blaze Pizza. I was tired, and decided to order Pizza. Liked making my own topping selections and Door Dash delivered in what I felt was unbelievable time to my hotel room door. The food was to my expectation ‚Ä¶More

name: Sarah Crosby
text: Sadly the worst experience I had coming to blaze. I was harrased by a homeless woman inside. The food was mediocre and I couldn't really enjoy it because the staff was allowing clearly allowinh a solicitor to roam around. ‚Ä¶More

name: Julian Negron
text: Amazing pizza.  Restaurant is nice and clean

name: Raeghan Steelberg
text: Very good, love that they have vegan options

name: Aimee Escamilla
text: My boyfriend and I usually go to the location in Orange. Its one of our favorite places. But this particular night we came back from a museum date from Hollywood and this location was closer from the freeway. I had to use the restroom ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Mendoza
text: Extremely fast service. Granted place was empty when we enter but we got our food in under 5 minutes. It was very good food. Pizzas are about 12 inches in diameter and cost about 10 bucks. IMO worth the price. Dining hall is small so it would be uncomfortable in here when packed.

name: Tamara&Ken Gary
text: Small, can order salads, quick

name: pdnapora
text: I ordered the Veg Out! Yum!  Friendly crew, too.

name: Brad S
text: Pizza was good, but clearly the staff didn't want to be there. Blaze is usually welcoming but not at this location. They made it seem like we were a problem.

name: Laura Inglis
text: Reasonable prices, great pizza. Better, quicker and probably cheaper than most of the chains in the area.

name: ANTHONY MARTIN
text: Not bad it's like mid pizza and pretty decent pricing but their doughknots are AMAZING!!

name: Naidona Ott
text: Pizza is pizza gave a two because the manager is clueless . Maybe it was her first day??  I won't go into all her issues, but I have been to this location several times and had no problems with anything...also had never seen her before. Hope this isn't the new normal for this location!!

name: Malio Lozano
text: Pizza was great. Staff was not friendly with the exception of Josh. Way to be an example Josh. Keep it up! .

name: L Cook
text: Over-priced when it compares to MOD.  Employees were not the friendliest.  Only good thing is their soda selection.  2 topping pizzas are their thing.

name: Josiah Vance
text: Great pizzas, they are ready just a few minutes after you order. I would definitely recommend this establishment.

name: Sydney Creer
text: We love blaze pizza but had a bad experience at this location. The manager was not professional and didn‚Äôt know how to work a cash register, she also didn‚Äôt ask before putting things on my pizza and seemed annoyed when I asked for more of a ‚Ä¶More

name: Rene Owen
text: We were in California for BlizCon!!! and staying at the Hyatt House.  Blaze Pizza is in the building.  OUTSTANDING in every way:  Selection; Service; Smells üòã; BUT especially TASTE!!! They were always busy but service was quick and courteous! I would go there next time I am in California and recommend them.

name: Ben Tapia
text: This location is somewhat difficult to get to, due to it's proximity to Disneyland and lack of a full parking lot, but the pizza is almost always excellent. The fact that I can get a pizza with as many toppings as I like (and there are a ‚Ä¶More

name: Deed HC
text: The food was good and made while you wait. I had salad and it was good. My daughter had half of a pizza and salad and she enjoyed it. They have a special blood orange lemonade which was different and excellent. It is a nice change of pace instead of regular fast food.

name: Casandra Yorgason
text: So expensive for such a thin pizza. They hardly put any cheese on it. It's not very filling

name: Christopher Henning
text: Quick, good, and priced well pretty much says it all.

name: Raymond Guzman
text: Really good pizza and surprise they sell beer there too,good place to eat!

name: Lucas Chan
text: Man oh man dis place is sooo good it tastes like doo doo!

name: David Clingman
text: Wow a quick experience and a friendly environment. I really enjoyed the food and the overall quality and not as expensive as other restaurants in the area.

name: Alan
text: Pretty nice layout and food is always good

name: Edwin Edwards
text: The so called manager, Jasmin was the rudest person I have ever come across. After making a mistake with our order and having us wait over 30 minutes for the doughknots and accidentally giving them to the wrong customer, she rolled her eyes ‚Ä¶More

name: Lisette Villa
text: Fast service, friendly workers and clean bathrooms!

name: Quentin McLeod
text: Excellent pizza! Freshly cooked and fresh ingredients. Very chill place with great staff.

name: Tracy Dy
text: HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE. First visit... Chick that was preparing my pizza placed two whole meatballs onto my pizza. Yup two big ol meatballs just sitting on my pizza. Was I suppose to break it up myself? Anyways.. I ordered 2 pizzas and ‚Ä¶More

name: Bhavya Muruganand
text: Loved the pizza totally.  It was ready in 15 mins and tasted awesome. The crust was thin and crunchy. Loved it

name: tuesday
text: I suggest going to another Blaze location, you'll have better service at the other locations. Felt like the workers still acted like they were in high school. This is close to Disneyland so it's like $2 more than the other location I go to. Oh and parking sucks.

name: Adrian Roybal
text: Pizza was really good. The beer satisfying.  The salad was nice. The line wait time sucked. That's where they need to refine the process.  It was frustrating. No consistency.  Fix that. And, it would get 5 stars.

name: K Man
text: Friendly customer service. I have allergies to dairy products and they were very accommodating. They have the option for vegan cheese and would offer to change out their gloves between pizza's. The pizzas were really yummy! I highly recommend this place especially if you have dairy allergies.

name: Aniruddha Upadhye
text: a very good option for quite dinner option after a day at Disney. Has plenty of veggie options. the pizza bites are unique. In general, a solid pizza option for big parties on budget.

name: Dean Kaufman
text: I came for second visit today.  I decided to get two Green Stripe pizzas & two of their Buffalo Chicken salads.  The extras were for my sister.  Some chicken in salad was not thoroughly cooked.  Green Stripe is different & very delicious.

name: michelle t
text: The pizza is great. both my husband and I had really good pizza, mine was  gf. *They are just unorganized in every blaze I've been to. At this one they had a hard time putting our order together and at the end lost my salad...so so so many employees on the line...I don't think that's how you do it.

name: Kevin Scoggin
text: Make your own personal size pizza. Grab a drink and add a salad! Awesome.

name: Mike Fife
text: I only visited once and just didn't like the food very much. The pizza reminded me of a frozen pizza from Safeway.  And the server was too heavy-handed with the salad dressing (balsamic) which tasted like something a Sysco truck would ‚Ä¶More

name: John
text: Yum delicious pizza and very quick. After Disneyland this was a great place to grab food for the hotel.

name: michael seijo
text: Deliciously made pizzas. Came over during Thanksgiving night. The manager and staff were hard working and friendly. Despite having to work Thanksgiving they made sure the place was well maintained and their patrons was taken care of. Great stop for those staying in the area as the place is clean and food was good.

name: Shawn Kroll
text: Blaze pizza was attached to the hotel. Convenient, quick & easy meal!  All pizza is good pizza

name: Cris Chico
text: Always a good pizza with lots of options for everyone. Love coming here with the kids becasue everyone can get their favorite pizza. Love the snores deserts.

name: Theresa Sanchez
text:
Horrible service and it was not even busy at the time. A line started forming after we got there with one family ahead of us.
It went like this: ‚Ä¶More

name: Darin McEvoy
text: Crust and sauce are delicious. Best made to order pizza. The absolute best part of this specific location... the late night staff: epic personalities combined  with top quality  ingredients = unforgettable pies. Tell them Darin sent you.

name: Jeff Rodas
text: Blaze Pizza is the number one pizza in the world lots of family and fun the kids are really loving please visit my website the ice Road King thank

name: Michael Noon
text: Absolute zero customer service. The food was ordered ahead of time and apparently already done. There FIVE people working and NONE of them even acknowledged me at the area to pick up the already ordered food. Not even a ‚Äòhello‚Äô or ‚Äòbe right ‚Ä¶More

name: Mika Hosoi
text:
It was great pizza. The best pizza i had ever.
The staffs are also friendly and great service.

name: David Sider
text: Best of its class. Salads and pizza topping options are plentiful and better than the competition...

name: Brian Woodward
text: I should have read reviews before ordering.  Ordered online for pick up.  Pizza was on time but i stood there for quite awhile being ignored...and i was literally 1 foot from employee.  The employees are like walking zombies and don't ‚Ä¶More

name: Lee Clench
text: Always a great experience and tasty flavorful pizza!

name: Adam Horsell
text: Wonderful Pizza and fantastic polite service. Great place near Disney for people staying around the area, price is a little dear but worth it for the fresh Pizza.

name: Micky
text: From what I can tell the staff gets paid to socialize rather than make pizzas. I was the only one in line, there were 4 employees standing around talking while another was watching the oven. The 4 employees did not do anything while I stood ‚Ä¶More

name: Maria Delgadillo
text: The cauliflower pizza crust was delicious

name: Ben Kickass
text: Pretty good pizza, nice staff, good prices door being around Disney

name: Francisco Torres
text: Favorite quick pizza place to go to. I build a pizza with almost every topping. They have my favorite salad, the tomato mozzarella. I'm not sure what the dressing they put on it but its perfect. I recommend this place and the salad! If you get the salad also ask for a side of balsamic to add to it.

name: Adrian Pacheco
text: The best blaze pizza I've been to. They are friendly are happy to accommodate your request and don't skimp on toppings.

name: Taylor Turner
text: I'm so glad they have gluten free crust. It was very good!

name: Brian Truitt
text: Pizza was good, service was friendly and the place was clean. Just a bit pricey for what you get.

name: mark balue
text: Good food friendly staff

name: Kacy Coleman
text: Sonya is always such a pleasure and she deserves a big RAISE!!

name: matthew manship
text: Quick and efficient in ordering to receiving your food. Good customer service.

name: Melanie Kretzler
text: Went in, asked for the 1-topping pizza, which is supposed to be like $7. She asked me what cheese and I said mozzarella and Ricotta. Then she asked me what topping. I was surprised because I though the ricotta would‚Äôve counted as a topping. ‚Ä¶More

name: Cristina Avila
text: Parking was a breeze. Definitely Disneyland prices, but the staff was friendly and got our order pretty quick.

name: Just Jack
text: We are huge fans of Blaze Pizza and are ecstatic that this location has finally opened. We are also annual passholders at Disneyland so we are at the park a lot and having such a great spot like this within walking distance is awesome! It's ‚Ä¶More

name: Sara Seaney
text: Always good, always fast, always friendly!

name: Ralph Bundschuh
text: For the US very good pizza in fast food style.

name: Andrew Austin
text: the girl that took and started my order yesterday and today was awesome... helpful,  efficient,  and cute.

name: Harris Fogel
text: Nice, better than nearby hotel food. A bit pricey. But good.

name: Rakesh Jain
text: Good thin crust pizza. And fast attentive service.

name: Johanan Hernandez
text: Great food but customer service was horrible, the employee started to curse at use under her breath because we asked 1 question. NOT PROFESSIONAL AT ALL!!!

name: preston davis
text: Awesome pizza, great staff.

name: Christina Sandahl
text: This was a cute little spot and the pizza was so good! Fast and delicious.

name: bla blabla
text: Cook uses tongs without care.  Tears big holes in every pizza using them.  Drove me crazy but the manager says they all do it that way.  I don't remember getting my cheese torn off my others pizzas in Vegas.  They don't care

name: Aimee LeCompte
text: Fresh pizza made to order in minutes. So good.

name: Aaron LePoire
text: Pizza made to order at the counter, pretty quick service as well. Only problem is that it's not very organized behind the counter and it can be difficult to know when your order is ready because they yell out names.

name: Dland_Dan
text: Killer üçï got the pesto drizzle chicken pizza and had them put extra pesto and it was amazing! And we got the artichoke and ricotta with red sauce. All must haves

name: Travel California
text: Terrible people especially the curly haired short girl thats works at night . Went there at 11.30 in the night ordered a create your own pizza and she put a piece of meat in my pizza I am a vegetarian .I pointed out that to her and she ‚Ä¶More

name: Jerilyn Peko
text: Great pizza and prices

name: Kitty Antix
text: Always sooo tasty!! It is a little bit on the saltier side but so0o0o yummmyyy. I get the spicy red marinara sauce and meat and veggies. Add a little bit of pesto drizzle and its SO0O0O GOOOOOD. MY MOUTH Waters every time.

name: Kevin O
text: Pizza & salad, very quick and reasonable prices

name: Esmeralda Mucollari
text: Had a terrible experience, the worker there purposely didn‚Äôt deliver my order and served others behind me first. Terrible workflow, and heard a loud noice because they dropped the all pan with phyllo dough on the floor. That made me uncomfortable to begin with and plus poor service.

name: Randy Christenson
text: Great pizza and good value!

name: Patty Tullock
text: My 9 year old grandsons love Blaze Pizza! They get to order what they want on their own pizza and watch it go into the oven and then out. The whole experience is fun and the pizza tastes great!

name: Jesus Of Nazareth The Only True Living God
text: Not the best blaze pizza. Employees are kinda rude. I won't be coming back here again.

name: Lynn Greene
text: Good pizza but the employees seemed as though they were suffering. No one was happy.

name: CityTo CityEnt
text: Tim A. was amazing totally steered me in the right direction pizza was good. Very welcomeing and Cynthia the straight faced huslter all business great team!!

name: R Johnson
text: By far my favorite pizza place I get to create my own and they cook it to perfection

name: Chyloe Bean
text: Amazing service, atmosphere and pizza

name: Dallin Kimble
text: Great food that is healthy and locally sourced. Service was excellent.

name: RUTHLESS CW
text: Best thin Pizza in Anaheim close to Disneyland.....forget all your other choices...

name: Isaac
text: The pizza was great, but the serving size was smaller compared to other pizza stores I've been to. The prices are also larger than others despite the small serving size.

name: Alexa A
text: Perfect.. delicious you can select what you want to eat

name: frances coleman
text: It was fun and great to design my own.

name: Denise Shook
text: What can i say??? LOVE how fast the pizza gets made. Always good.

name: Nikolai Dahl
text: Wow, we kept wanting to come back here - great pizza, very fast, custom and delicious. Also the soft drinks were a nice bonus

name: Anto the squirrel.
text: The pizza is amazing.Five stars!üòäüòú

name: Henry Rohlfing
text: Fast service, good pizza, could be more crispy but still tasty. If you're looking for a crispy slice of pizza, I would not come here

name: Joseph Dalldorf
text: Had them when visiting for blizzcon. Great option when attending a convention as the pricing is way more reasonable then what you can find inside and it's only about a 5 minute walk from the convention center.

name: Charles Jeong
text: Thank You for being open on new year's Eve üòò

name: Ana Nunes
text: The pizza was good. The employees, however, had very poor customer service. First, I‚Äôm standing in line to build my own and they ignore me and tried to give my pizza to the next person. Then the 3 people that came after me got their pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: James 3
text: Pretty good for a quick lunch

name: Wei Cui
text: Simply fantastic. The pizza was very gourmet, the salad selection impeccable, and the beverage and beer/wine choices quite nice and very reasonably priced. One of the few places near the Disney parks that reflect that we live in the 21st century.

name: Dynamic Martial Arts
text: Hungry at 11 pm after a long day in Disneyland, we found this gem on Google Maps. Build your own pizza out of an array of tasty and healthy (nitrate free meat!) ingredients, pay next to nothing, have the pizza ready in no time AND get ‚Ä¶More

name: Jon ly
text: The best build your own pizza place.

name: Brian Puinti
text: Delicious food. Staff here wasn't great when we went but you can't expect too much from teenage girls with juicy gossip. They stood in front of us and talked for a good 3 minutes without addressing us. If not for them 5 stars.

name: Jon DeCamp
text: I ate my pizza too quick because it was so good, but the rest of the experience was not. The order taker was rude and didn't explain the order process, and didn't take our extra modifications and tried to blame someone else. I hate to rate so low, but compared to any Mod Pizza, this place was 3 stars.

name: Sean Stevens
text: Came to Anaheim on a honeymoon, and tried this place because it looked good from the outside. Beat decision we've made so far. This place was fast, delicious, and had great beer on tap. 10/10 would eat again!!

name: Jason Gallaugher
text: Not bad, would have been a 5 star review thought.  Ordered two nights in a row, first night was amazing, second night made one error, jalepeno's showed up instead.  My wife is allergic.  We called the store, talked to the general manager, ‚Ä¶More

text: Great pizza! Awsome service especially when it was busy!

name: Gilbert Lopez
text: It was a little spendy, but very good. In the future I will ask for extra cheese since there was not a lot on the pizza. You should expect the thin crust, or California Style, since you are in that area. I liked that Blaze was just a few blocks from the hotel so walked, but there is parking.
